Package org.kiji.schema.filter

Row level filters used when reading data from Kiji tables.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
KijiRowFilterDeserializer Responsible for deserializing KijiRowFilters from the results of a call to KijiRowFilter.toJson().
 

Class Summary
AndColumnFilter Combines a list of column filters using a logical AND operator.
AndRowFilter Combines a list of row filters using a logical AND operator.
AndRowFilter.AndRowFilterDeserializer Deserializes AndRowFilter.
CellByteSizeAsValueFilter Filter that replaces the value of each cell by its size, in number of bytes.
ColumnValueEqualsRowFilter A KijiRowFilter that only includes rows where a specific column's most recent value equals a specified value.
ColumnValueEqualsRowFilter.ColumnValueEqualsRowFilterDeserializer Deserializes ColumnValueEqualsRowFilter.
Filters Utility class to manipulate row and column filters.
FormattedEntityIdRowFilter A KijiRowFilter that filters out rows that do not match the components specified.
FormattedEntityIdRowFilter.FormattedEntityIdRowFilterDeserializer Deserializes FormattedEntityIdRowFilter.
HasColumnDataRowFilter A KijiRowFilter that excludes rows that have no data for some column columnName.
HasColumnDataRowFilter.HasColumnDataRowFilterDeserializer Deserializes HasColumnDataRowFilter.
KijiColumnFilter A column filter provides a means of filtering cells from a column on the server side.
KijiColumnFilter.Context An object available to KijiColumnFilters that can be used to help implement the toHBaseFilter() method.
KijiColumnRangeFilter Column filter that bounds the range of returned qualifiers within a map-type family.
KijiFirstKeyOnlyColumnFilter A column filter that limits the number of versions to 1.
KijiRandomRowFilter A row filter that accepts or rejects rows at random.
KijiRandomRowFilter.KijiRandomRowFilterDeserializer A class to deserialize the KijiRandomRowFilter from a JsonNode.
KijiRowFilter The abstract base class for filters that exclude data from KijiRows.
KijiRowFilter.Context A helper class for converting between Kiji objects and their HBase counterparts.
KijiRowFilterApplicator Applies a KijiRowFilter to various row-savvy objects.
OrColumnFilter Combines a list of column filters using a logical OR operator.
OrRowFilter Combines a list of row filters using a logical OR operator.
OrRowFilter.OrRowFilterDeserializer Deserializes OrRowFilter.
RegexQualifierColumnFilter A KijiColumnFilter that only allows qualifiers that match a given regular expression.
StripValueColumnFilter Column filter to strip the cell value.
StripValueRowFilter A KijiRowFilter that applies HBase's KeyOnly filter to the KijiDataRequest.
StripValueRowFilter.StripValueRowFilterDeserializer Deserializes StripValueRowFilter.
 

Package org.kiji.schema.filter Description

Row level filters used when reading data from Kiji tables.

Provides row level filters which are applied to data read from KijiTable. Only one filter can be used at a time, but a single filter can be composed as a combination of multiple filters using the operator filters: AndRowFilter and OrRowFilter. Filters are applied to KijiDataRequest objects.
